title.value: RapidBrachyTG43: A TG-43 Parameter and Dose Calculation Module for RapidBrachyMCTPs
title.justification: The paper introduces a module specifically named 'RapidBrachyTG43' for dose calculation in the context of the RapidBrachyMCTPS system.
title.quote: RapidBrachyTG43: A TG-43 PARAMETER AND DOSE CALCULATION MODULE FOR RapidBrachyMCTPs

extractions.description: The paper discusses the implementation and evaluation of a TG-43 parameter and dose calculation module within the RapidBrachyMCTPS system, which is a brachytherapy treatment planning system. The research aims to optimize the Dww calculation using the TG-43 formalism for clinical dosimetry and involves the development of a specialized Monte Carlo usercode for accurate calculations.

type.justification: The paper includes implementation, testing, and results of dose calculations, which are characteristic of empirical research.
type.quote: TG-43 Dww calculation performed by this module was compared to MC Dww from RapidBrachyMCTPS; planned dose for an Ir-192 breast brachytherapy case was calculated for both methods...

name.justification: The research involves dose calculation in brachytherapy, which is typically a topic within Medical Physics.
name.quote: Clinical dose calculations in brachytherapy are performed according to the AAPM TG-43 formalism...

name.justification: The paper is specifically concerned with dose calculations in brachytherapy treatment planning.
name.quote: Clinical dose calculations in brachytherapy are performed according to the AAPM TG-43 formalism...

name.justification: The paper proposes the RapidBrachyTG43 as a model for TG-43 parameter and dose calculation within RapidBrachyMCTPS.
name.quote: RapidBrachyTG43: A TG-43 PARAMETER AND DOSE CALCULATION MODULE FOR RapidBrachyMCTPs

is_contributed.justification: The model was developed as part of the research presented in the paper.
is_contributed.quote: This work aims to optimize Dww calculation in RapidBrachyMCTPS by implementing dose calculation based on the TG-43 formalism.

is_executed.justification: The model is implemented and executed to perform dose calculations.
is_executed.quote: TG-43 Dww calculation performed by this module was compared to MC Dww from RapidBrachyMCTPS...

is_compared.justification: The model's calculations were compared to those from another method within the same system.
is_compared.quote: A gamma index comparison between the two dose distributions yielded a pass rate of 99.3% with a 1%/1 mm criterion.

name.justification: Geant4 is explicitly mentioned as part of the Monte Carlo usercode needed for TG-43 parameter calculations.
name.quote: Dww are calculated from a MC usercode based on Geant4 v. 10.02.p02...
